subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Sam Vincent was fired by the Charlotte Bobcats after one turmoil-filled season as coach. Vincent struggled to find a consistent rotation and clashed with his players while leading the Bobcats to a 32-50 record. Vincent, a former first-round pick of the Boston Celtics who played with Jordan in Chicago, had worked for one year under Avery Johnson with the Dallas Mavericks, his only N.B.A. coaching experience.
